info.title: Tacos API
info.description: An API for managing tacos with a touch of humor and a hint of spice! Join us on a delightful journey through the world of tacos, where every bite is a fiesta. Explore our menu, create your own taco masterpieces, and savor the flavor of happiness. Tacos, because who needs a superhero when you have tacos?
